pull_request.title: WIP: Enable access to the curves and certificate type
pull_request.body:
This PR changes enable access to the curves and certificate type used in TLSv1.3 handshakes.

This equivalent to access to the ciphers used in the TLS session. The benefit is that monitoring/logging can not only report the protocol and ciphers, but also the curve and certificate type used for a TLSv1.3 connection on the client side. In particular, an user can verify that a quantum-safe-crypto curve and certificate was used.

-->

repo.name: oqs-openssl
repo.description: Fork of OpenSSL that includes prototype quantum-resistant algorithms and ciphersuites based on liboqs

review.body: Thanks for adding the test. Could you please use constants such as to make this "future proof"? Also, a test using an OQS algorithm would be good such as to ensure the added OQS logic gets tested, too.

pull_request.title: Fix rendering error in Markdown
pull_request.body:
The Markdown for "ancestors of primary source" wasn't rendering properly, this fixes it.

- [ ] After commit, update liboqs include www and deploy
